definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
Mountain of Flames of legend/fig. insurmountable obstacle/Mountain of Flames in Turpan depression in Xinjiang
when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

definition: to feed the starving ghosts (i.e. offer sacrifice to protect the departed spirit)
lit. a mouth spitting with poisonous flames/to speak angrily to sb (idiom)

sentences.english: Oxyacetylene flame is the hottest one kwonn for ordinary use.
sentences.chinese: 氧炔焰是常规用途中最热的火焰。

sentences.english: Oxyacetylene flame is the hottest one known for ordinary use.
sentences.chinese: 氧炔焰是常规用途中最热的火焰。

sentences.english: The animal hair was burnt out by secondary flame.
sentences.chinese: 二次焰可引起动物潦毛。

sentences.english: The formation of secondary muzzle flash is closely related to reducing gases in combustion products.
sentences.chinese: 枪炮二次焰的形成与燃烧产物中还原性气体息息相关。

sentences.english: A new, design of atomization furnace with flame diffusing air to hydrogen is described.
sentences.chinese: 还叙述了新设计的氢空气扩散焰火焰原子化器。

sentences.english: This paper studies the relation between knock and ion current of post-flame zone.
sentences.chinese: 作者研究了焰后区的离子电流信号与爆震的关系。

sentences.english: Our prophet is Homura, she is our leader and our Saviour.
sentences.chinese: 焰是我们的先知，她是我们的领袖及救世主。

sentences.english: Therefor, AN can effectively inhibit the secondary muzzle flash of gunnery.
sentences.chinese: 因此，硝酸铵能有效抑制二次焰的形成。

sentences.english: All living beings and those in the Realms of Fiery Mara, the three evil paths.
sentences.chinese: 所有一切众生，以及焰摩罗界，三恶道中。

sentences.english: Oxyacetylene flame can' be used for welding of pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 管道焊接不得使用氧乙炔焰焊接。

sentences.english: The superiorities and inferiorities of the end-port furnace on its structural characteristics were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 从熔窑结构特征上探讨了马蹄焰熔窑的优势和劣势。

sentences.english: The preferred method is by oxyacetylene flame .
sentences.chinese: 最好采用氧炔焰加热方法。

definition: stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
